text:
I don’t know why anyone was surprised by this. Would Theresa May have a) taken 2 weeks off to sort her divorce ahead of breaking news to her family that she & her lover 24 yrs her junior about to have 6th or 7th child? Or b) chaired the COBRA meetings? 

https://t.co/xOGV9GCwTL
